mapper.insert: insert into RCM_WEBSERVICE_LOG (ID, SYS_NAME, MESSAGE_SEND, MESSAGE_RECEIVED, SUCCESS_FLAG, CREATE_TIME, USE_TIME, ERROR_MESSAGE) values(#{id},#{sysName}, #{messageSend}, #{messageReceived}, #{successFlag}, sysdate, #{useTime}, #{errorMessage})
mapper.select: select l.id, l.sys_name, l.success_flag, to_char(l.create_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as create_time,l.use_time from rcm_webservice_log l where 1=1 and l.success_flag = '${successFlag}' and l.sys_name = '${sysName}' order by l.create_time desc
select * from rcm_webservice_log where 1=1 and id=#{id}
